meanings.definition: The state of not being employed.
meanings.sent1: Nonemployment can be a difficult time for many people.
meanings.sent2: She experienced nonemployment after the company downsized.
meanings.sent3: The nonemployment of the clown led to a shortage of laughter in the circus.
meanings.sent4: In the garden of opportunities, nonemployment was the wilting flower.
meanings.sent5: The town's economy suffered greatly due to the high rate of nonemployment.

meanings.definition: The condition of being without a job.
meanings.sent1: Nonemployment can bring financial challenges to families.
meanings.sent2: After graduation, he faced a period of nonemployment before finding a job.
meanings.sent3: The nonemployment of the chef resulted in many burnt dinners.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams soared high above the clouds, away from the shadows of nonemployment.
meanings.sent5: The community came together to support those experiencing nonemployment during the recession.
